value.name: Harris County Officials Support Pardoning George Floyd for 2004 Drug Arrest
value.description: Top leaders in the Texas county where George Floyd grew up supported a resolution Tuesday calling for him to be posthumously pardoned for a 2004 drug arrest by a former Houston police officer now facing murder charges in a separate case.
